title: How to Make a Pumpkin Spice Shake

steps.headline: Put 1/4 of the canned pumpkin in a large bowl.
Mix in the 3 tablespoons (44.4 ml) of cinnamon and 2 teaspoons of nutmeg.
Heat in the microwave for 20 seconds.
Put the pumpkin and spice mix in the fridge for 2 hours.
Get out the apple cider and ice cream.
Let the ice cream soften for 10 minutes.
Put the cider and 3 scoops of ice cream in the blender.
Put the ice cream with the pumpkin mix in the blender.
Blend until it's all mixed up.
Add a touch of milk and stir.

text: Put 1/4 of the canned pumpkin in a large bowl.  Mix in the 3 tablespoons (44.4 ml) of cinnamon and 2 teaspoons of nutmeg. Stir until well mixed. Heat in the microwave for 20 seconds.  Put the pumpkin and spice mix in the fridge for 2 hours.  Get out the apple cider and ice cream.  Let the ice cream soften for 10 minutes.  Put the cider and 3 scoops of ice cream in the blender.  Blend until smooth.  Put the ice cream with the pumpkin mix in the blender.  Blend until it's all mixed up.  Pour into 5 different glasses.  Add a touch of milk and stir.  Sprinkle cinnamon on top.  Serve immediately!
